translations: （大量物体）像雹子般落下（或击打）；跟……打招呼；示意（出租车）停下；把……誉为；（热烈）欢迎（hail 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Laura flits about New York hailing taxis at every opportunity.
sentences.translation: 劳拉在纽约到处跑来跑去，一有机会就打出租车。

sentences.sentence: When the film came out the critics went wild, hailing Tarantino as the golden boy of the 1990s.
sentences.translation: 该影片一上映评论家们就大肆追捧，把塔兰蒂诺誉为20世纪90年代的黄金男孩。

sentences.sentence: The Australian uncle also complained about the price of Uber, an Australian taxi-hailing software.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚的叔叔也抱怨澳大利亚的一款打车软件——优步的价格。
